DOC.brief_summary: This study will determine the cumulative irritation potential and sensitization potential of dapsone gel and vehicle after repeat applications on the skin of healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Dermal Tolerability of Dapsone Gel in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy adults. Skin diseases, excessive hair, tattoos, pigmentation, scars or moles that could interfere with patch application Sensitivity to adhesive bandages or tape.
